description:
Write a program to check whether a given number 'n' is a palindrome number. #### `Input Format:` `The input consists of a single integer 'n' (0 <= n <= 10^9).` #### `Output Format:` `The program should print Palindrome or Not Palindrome. It should implement the given function to check whether 'n' is a Palindrome or Not Palindrome number.`
***`Note that the driver code will handle the printing, so your function only needs to return the result.`*** #### `Example:` #### `Input:` ``` 121 ``` #### `Output:` ``` Palindrome ``` #### `Explanation:` `The given number is 121, which is a palindrome number because it remains the same when reversed.`
title: Palindrome Number
